It is a theory not only of curved space, but of curved or warped time as well. Einstein had realized in 1905, that space and time, are intimately connected with each other. ... Thus one can think of space and time together, as a four-dimensional entity, called space-time.
According to the Einstein’s theory of relativity, this whole universe is a space time plane which curves with a different amount of curvature for different different objects.
